title.rendered: How to easily find a Delivery Boy for Restaurant in 2024?

content.rendered:
Whether a Delivery Boy, Cook for Restaurant or Waiters, the challenge is always the same in Delhi NCR – How do you find them?

Good news – Finding them is easy in 2024.

Try Helpers Near Me now, and connect with a nearby Delivery Boys today.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Verification of Restaurant Staff is easy in 2024. It can be done online.

Owning a restaurant or a cloud kitchen in a metro city like Delhi NCR is quite an achievement.

And running the restaurant or kitchen successfully is another level of achievement.

As an owner, some of the things you track almost every day are:

  • Serving the best of the foods to your Customers
  • Enough Customer walk-ins or orders every day
  • Every Customer to be a ‘Happy Customer’
  • Having decent ratings for your food & restaurant on your favourite apps
  • Good online reviews of your restaurant/kitchen
  • Enough recommendations for your restaurant & food on your social pages
  • No negative publicity
  • And a few similar other things

You try to ensure your restaurant becomes the talk of the town for its ambience, food, and space where people would want to come & spend some time.

However, in trying to ensure everything works perfectly for your restaurant, there’s one area of concern, which is always a big challenge for you & your restaurant managers – Finding your staff!

How much does a Delivery Boy for Restaurants cost in 2024? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring a Delivery Boy for Restaurants in 2024?

The average monthly cost of hiring a Delivery Boy for a Restaurant varies between ₹12,000 to ₹15,000.

Mostly, they consider the travelling expenses for deliveries as a separate cost, charged over & above their fixed salaries.

However, lately, due to the food delivery apps, their expectations for such deliveries have gone up. Many earn as much as ₹18,000 to ₹20,000 for 12/15 hrs work at these apps.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the Delivery Boy cost near you in 2024? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Having adequate staff for your restaurant is as important as ensuring great food for your Customers.

When everything’s going right for your restaurant business, you don’t want your staff to be a concern for you, which, in reality, always is.

Imagine this:

One beautiful Sunday, you reach your Restaurant. You are looking forward to the evening home deliveries for a pre-booked house party at one of your loyal customers.

You’ve arrived at your restaurant early to ensure that everything is arranged much in advance so that the food is prepared well and that there’s no delay in any of the evening deliveries.

And then by mid-afternoon, you get a call from one of your Delivery Boy that he’s not coming in the evening.

Suddenly, your entire plan & arrangement goes for a toss.

And since your deliveries rely highly on your Delivery Boys, your complete plan goes shaky just because one of the two delivery boys did not turn up.

This could be any of your other staff – your lead Cook or the Waiter or Manager whose presence ensures that the Orders are furnished.

And this could be any of the days in the life of your restaurant.

So, in the end, what would you do? How would you solve this immediate problem?

Here are some of the choices you are left with:

  1. Cancel your evening plan so that you can deliver the food yourself.
  2. Call your friend who runs another restaurant in the other part of the city
  3. Ask your manager to find one Delivery Boy asap
  4. Ask your other Staff who would know someone in any other restaurant
  5. Check with your friendly neighbourhood restaurant if he could lend you his Delivery Boy for one evening
  6. You even connect with a few agents or contractors who might help you with a handful of commission

No matter your choice, it would still be a temporary fix for your immediate problem. In the end, you would anyway have to fix the problem permanently.

Either you would scold your Delivery Boy who didn’t turn up, or you would fire him, or you would find an alternative.

And every option would still push you to ‘finding an alternative Delivery Boy.’

And until you have your running restaurant, a problem like this will persist.

So, how do you fix this problem so you can focus on what’s essential for your Customers & Restaurant?

How do you attend to this problem so that it gets fixed permanently?

Meet Helpers Near Me.

Helpers Near Me (HNM) helps you find a Delivery Boy for your Restaurant in just a few minutes.

Follow these 3 simple steps to find a Delivery Boy in 2024 easily.

  1. Sign in with your credentials.
  2. Search for the Delivery Boy and enter your location. The platform automatically fetches, assigns and displays a couple of best-rated workers to your search result.
  3. Select a Plan, Pay a nominal fee (starting at ₹99) and connect with every Delivery Boy featured in your search result. Among them, you hire whoever you like permanently. Once you’ve hired, pay the salary directly to the Delivery Boy.

Finding a Delivery Boy has never been as easy as in 2024.

7 solid reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when you are looking for a Delivery Boy for Restaurants:

1) Convenient, Easy & Organised

You can find Delivery Boys at Helpers Near Me at your convenience.

It is Easier, Simpler & Better.

5 minutes and just a click of a few buttons is all it takes to find Delivery Boys here.

2) Legally Verified Delivery Boys

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Delivery Boy registered with the platform.

Everyone’s IDs and Court/Criminal Records are checked in detail.

At an additional fee of ₹199, you can also get a copy of the Background Verification report of the Delivery Boy you hire from the platform.

3) Connect with nearby Delivery Boys

Helpers Near Me helps you find a Delivery Boy near your location – preferably within 4-5 km of your location.

Furthermore, HNM also helps you connect with Delivery Boys who are migrants looking for Delivery Boy work.

4) Speak with multiple Delivery Boys near you

HNM helps you connect with a few options for Delivery Boys near you, not just 1 or 2.

HNM offers choices so that you get to choose the best one among all the available Delivery Boys near you.

5) Find and Hire Delivery Boys at a nominal fee

You can connect with multiple Delivery Boys at a nominal fee at Helpers Near Me.

Usually, the charges start from ₹99 but vary as per the location and the profile you are looking for.

It also offers multiple plans, making it economical to find a Delivery Boy near you.

6) There are no middlemen in between

Helpers Near Me never works with the middlemen.

So when you try the platform, HNM helps you connect directly with the Delivery Boys.

And once you’ve hired the Delivery Boy, you pay the salary directly to him.

There are no agents, contractors or commissions in between.

7) Customer-friendly 100% Refund Policy

HNM’s refund policy is quite friendly to you as a customer.

You can find Delivery Boys near you or claim a refund for the money you paid.

Learn more about HNM’s 100% Refund Policy.

Imagine this convenience and finding a Delivery Boy in just a few minutes.

This convenience on your mobile phone solves all the trouble you would have to take otherwise.

So, when you need to find Delivery Boys near you, try Helpers Near Me.

HNM is the easiest way to find a Delivery Boy (or Cooks for Restaurants or Waiters) in Delhi NCR.

So, if you still rely on references or contractors, try Helpers Near Me before you try anything else.
